headline: Citigroup and Apollo's $7 Billion Gamble: Will Private Credit Reshape M&A Deals
summary: Inside the high-stakes financing deal that could change the game for Boeing and Wall Street

headline: State Street Tries to Tap Long-Lost Mojo With Private Credit ETF
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The first-ever ETF to bring private assets to the masses was meant to be a milestone this year in Yie-Hsin Hung’s push to shake off State Street Corp.’s reputation for being cautious and boring.Most Read from BloombergTrump DEI Purge Hits Affordable Housing GroupsHow Britain’s Most Bike-Friendly New Town Got BuiltICE Eyes Massive California Tent Facility Amid Space ConstraintsThe Dark Prophet of Car-Clogged CitiesWashington, DC, Region Braces for ‘Devastating’ Cuts from CongressHu

headline: Citi, Apollo Test Private Credit Tie-Up in Boeing Unit Sale
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Citigroup Inc. and Apollo Global Management Inc. are offering potential buyers of Boeing Co.’s Jeppesen navigation unit the option to fund the acquisition through the pair’s nascent private credit partnership, according to people familiar with the matter.Most Read from BloombergTrump DEI Purge Hits Affordable Housing GroupsHow Britain’s Most Bike-Friendly New Town Got BuiltICE Eyes Massive California Tent Facility Amid Space ConstraintsThe Dark Prophet of Car-Clogged CitiesWashing
